DOC.brief_summary: Blood gas analysis were routinely monitor every 4 hours in our surgical cardiac intensive care unit (SICU). These luxury investigations waste the resources. Therefore we develop a pathological- based guideline for arterial blood gas analysis in patients after cardiac surgery. We test the guideline for its safety and efficacy.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of Using Pathological- Based Guidelines for Arterial Blood Gas Analysis in Patients Aftercardiac Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patient undergone elective cardiac surgery with cardiopulmonary bypass Emergency surgery
